sectionTitle.text3: Flexible pricing options designed to meet your needs — whether you're just getting started or scaling up.
See how our AI thumbnails are helping channels explode their views.

items.name: Sophia Carter
items.quote: This SaaS app has completely streamlined our onboarding process. What used to take hours now takes minutes!

items.name: Ethan Walker
items.quote: We’ve tried several tools, but nothing comes close in terms of speed and simplicity. Absolute game-changer.

items.name: Maya Patel
items.quote: The automation features alone have saved our team countless hours every week. Worth every penny.

items.name: Liam Brooks
items.quote: Setup was ridiculously easy. Within 10 minutes, we were running live and onboarding our first customers.

footer.tagline: Making every customer feel valued—no matter the size of your audience.

generate.heading: Create your thumbnail
generate.subheading: Describe your vision and let AI bring it to life

form.additionalPlaceholder: Add any specific elements, mood, or style preferences.
form.publicHint: If enabled, your thumbnail will appear in the community feed.

referenceImages.label: Reference images
referenceImages.hint: Optional. Upload up to 2 images to guide the model (person, background, or overall style).

errors.invalidType: Only PNG, JPG or WEBP images are allowed
errors.tooMany: You can upload up to {{n}} images

hero.title: Professional thumbnails in seconds
hero.subtitle: Thumbzilla is an AI thumbnail generator built for creators and teams who want speed without losing control. We analyze your video context to propose clickable concepts, then turn those ideas into publish-ready designs.

stats.title: Real speed
stats.description: Less time designing, more time creating.

stats.title: Full control
stats.description: Fine-tune every detail until it’s perfect.

mission.title: Help creators publish more—and better
mission.description: We reduce the time between idea and upload. Our goal is thumbnails that stand out, stay on-brand, and improve your metrics.

vision.title: Automate the repetitive, amplify creativity
vision.description: AI should handle the heavy lifting: composition, contrast, readability, and consistency—so you focus on content.

promise.title: Quality, simplicity, measurable outcomes
promise.description: A simple experience: clear inputs, fast generation, and outputs designed to perform in the feed.

about.featuresSubtitle: Built to turn ideas into high-impact thumbnails: fast, readable, consistent, and ready to scale your channel.

smart.title: Smart analysis
smart.description: We suggest concepts and angles aligned with your topic to maximize clarity and click-through.

fast.title: Fast generation
fast.description: Get results in seconds so you can iterate without slowing your publishing pace.

editable.title: Fully editable
editable.description: Outputs prepared for fine tweaks: text, visual hierarchy, composition, and style.

optimized.title: Optimized for YouTube
optimized.description: We prioritize readability, contrast, and structure to stand out at small sizes.

reliable.title: Brand consistency
reliable.description: Keep a coherent look with repeatable styles, accents, and visual decisions.

creator.title: Creator-first UX
creator.description: Simple flow, no fluff—what you need to publish faster and better.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: A short, direct flow designed to produce thumbnails ready to use.

steps.title: Describe your video
steps.description: Add title and context. The AI uses that to understand the focus and angle.

steps.title: Pick style and format
steps.description: Choose a look (bold, tech, minimal) and the aspect ratio you need.

steps.title: Generate and refine
steps.description: Generate variations, pick the best one, and tweak until it’s perfect.

how.note: Tip: try 2–3 variations to find the most clickable angle.

story.title: Built with product & performance mindset
story.p1: Thumbzilla started from a real problem: creators and teams wasting hours tweaking designs without a consistent, repeatable process.
story.p2: We apply the same approach I use in software: scalable systems, clear UX, and measurable impact. The goal isn’t just “a nice image”—it’s helping you publish more often with better results.

builder.title: A Full Stack builder focused on scalable systems
builder.description: I’m Nicolás Espin. I build high-performance React/Next.js ecosystems and AI automation. At Andeshire, I led migrations and frontend patterns and orchestrated AI agents to automate real workflows.
builder.name: Nicolás Espin

final.title: Ready to improve your thumbnails?
final.subtitle: Join creators accelerating their workflow with AI and conversion-focused designs.
